GSD.product_version: versions from v5.14 to before v6.0.13
GSD.description:
net: dsa: sja1105: avoid out of bounds access in sja1105_init_l2_policing()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.13 by commit 147f3e3d84054117ae6b9bf317ec4fda9f991192, it was introduced in version v5.14 by commit 38fbe91f2287c696f290d9115901aa435f7166a8. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: net: dsa: sja1105: avoid out of bounds access in sja1105_init_l2_policing()
